property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This spell costs up to 3 less to summon for each of your linked Gods in the battle zone. It can't cost less than 1. ■ Destroy all creatures except Gods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Vortex evolution—Put on 2 of your fire creatures. ■ Each of your Dragons and Phoenix in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures. ■ When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may return any number of fire creatures from your graveyard and/or mana zone to your hand instead. Then return this creature to your deck and shuffle it. {TRIPLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked and blocked.) ■ This creature breaks an additional shield for each card linked to this one. ■ God Link (Flame Agon, God of Flames) Right Side or (Shine Valkyrie, Heavenly God) Left Side

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a card from it and put it into your mana zone. If you do, put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard and put a non-evolution Wild Veggies not named 'Baron Gouyama' from your mana zone into the battle zone. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your multicolored creatures. ■ Your opponent can't cast spells other than multicolored spells. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature gets +4000 power for each civilization in your mana zone. ■ While this creature has power 6000 or more, it has "double breaker". ■ While this creature has power 15000 or more, it has "triple breaker". ■ While this creature has power 20000 or more, it has "quattro breaker".

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever one of your Dragons is destroyed, you may draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, for each card linked to this one, your opponent destroys one of their creatures and puts a card from their mana zone into their graveyard. ■ When this creature is destroyed, return one of your other Gods from your graveyard to your hand. ■ God Link (Blue Poseidon, Sea God) Right Side or (Flame Agon, God of Flames) Left Side

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, for each card linked to this one, your opponent destroys one of their creatures and puts a card from their mana zone into their graveyard. ■ When this creature is destroyed, return one of your other Gods from your graveyard to your hand. ■ God Link (Blue Poseidon, Sea God) Right Side or (Flame Agon, God of Flames) Left Side

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Civilization breaker (This creature breaks a shield for each civilization in your mana zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your Dragons attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Dragon, put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put a non-evolution creature from your mana zone. Choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone and your opponent puts it. Then choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures from the battle zone and put them into their owner's mana zones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Over Drive—Darkness x1 + Fire x1 + Nature x1 (When you summon this creature, you may tap another 1 darkness, 1 fire and 1 nature card in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gets the following {OVER DRIVE}: ability.): {OVER DRIVE}: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has more cards in their hand than you have in yours, you may draw until you have the same number of cards as them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Over Drive—Darkness x1 + Fire x1 + Nature x1 (When you summon this creature, you may tap another 1 darkness, 1 fire and 1 nature card in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gets the following {OVER DRIVE}: ability.): {OVER DRIVE}: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has more cards in their hand than you have in yours, you may draw until you have the same number of cards as them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Your Dragons cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ Whenever your "Bolmeteus Musha Dragon" attacks, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Your Dragons cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ Whenever your "Bolmeteus Musha Dragon" attacks, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ This creature can't attack creatures. ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ This creature can't be attacked. ■ Whenever this creature attacks, search your deck. You may take a creature from it, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {POWER ATTACKER} +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) ■ Over Drive—Light x1 + Water x1 + Nature x1 (When you summon this creature, you may tap another 1 light, 1 water and 1 nature card in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gets the following {OVER DRIVE}: ability.): {OVER DRIVE}: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your opponent's tapped creatures or this creature breaks one of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You can put an evolution creature of any race on this creature. ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put a Dragon from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} Search your deck. You may take a God that can link with one of your Gods in the battle zone, put it into the battle zone, and link it with that God. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ Destroy one of your opponent's non-multicolored creatures. ■ Your opponent chooses 2 non-multicolored cards in their mana zone and puts them into their graveyard. ■ Search your deck. You may take a multicolored creature from it, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each civilization in your mana zone, you may look at a card from the top of your deck. Put one of them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -1000 power for each civilization you have in your mana zone until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Your opponent chooses a card from their hand and discards it. If the discarded card has the same civilization as a card in your mana zone, your opponent chooses a card in their mana zone and puts it into their graveyard.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

If you have at least one Bolmeteus Musha Dragon in the battle zone, destroy another of your opponent's creatures that has power 5000 or less.

card.name: Momonga Jirou, Flying Ninja of the Forest

property.name: Rules

You may take a creature from your deck that costs the same as or less than the number of civilizations in your mana zone, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top 5 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Then put 5 cards from your mana zone into your graveyard.
